components.description: This includes the UDFs and UDAFs
components.name: UDF

fields.description:
Scenario:
 # Create ACID table t1 and insert few rows.
 # Create materialized view mvÂ as select a from t1 where a > 5;
 # Run get_split query "select get_splits( select a from t1 where a > 5); – This fails with AssertionError.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Query with get_splits UDF fails if materialized view is created on queried table.
